response.overview: In this documentary, the Asturian rescues for Dazn some of the key moments of the season. When Noemí de Miguel asks him what he felt after getting back behind the wheel of a Formula 1, the Alpine driver does not hesitate: «It has been fun to feel the adrenaline of racing again, of competition. I think I'm going to experience many things again and I look forward to doing so. Everything was exciting, those first laps and being in the fight with the other cars has been a bit of adrenaline that continues to rise. Even though the two cars in front of you are fighting, you already have a little excitement and your heart beats a little faster.
response.title: Alonso 2021, el origen del plan
